plugin.comment: vocalizations generated at intervals when nothing else is happening.

tagRef.name: idle noncombat
tagRef.description: played randomly and intermittently whenever we aren't in combat

tagRef.name: idle combat
tagRef.description: played randomly and intermittently whenever we're in combat

tagRef.name: idle flee
tagRef.description: played continuously while we are fleeing

plugin.comment: vocalizations generated automatically when damaged; interrupt everything except scripted dialogue.

tagRef.name: pain body minor
tagRef.description: took body damage

tagRef.name: pain body major
tagRef.description: took a significant amount of body damage

tagRef.name: pain shield
tagRef.description: took shield damage

tagRef.name: pain falling
tagRef.description: took damage from falling

tagRef.name: scream fear
tagRef.description: screaming in fear (falling to your death, explosive stuck to you)

tagRef.name: scream pain
tagRef.description: screaming in pain (being flamed)

tagRef.name: maimed limb
tagRef.description: limb body part (arm or leg) was destroyed

tagRef.name: maimed head
tagRef.description: head body part was destroyed

tagRef.name: death quiet
tagRef.description: died from minor damage, or was unprepared

tagRef.name: death violent
tagRef.description: died from violent trauma

tagRef.name: death falling
tagRef.description: died from falling

tagRef.name: death agonizing
tagRef.description: died in a horribly painful fashion (burnt to death)

tagRef.name: death instant
tagRef.description: died instantly

tagRef.name: death flying
tagRef.description: died and was blown up into the air

tagRef.name: damaged friend
tagRef.description: hurt a friendly AI

tagRef.name: damaged friend player
tagRef.description: hurt a friendly player

tagRef.name: damaged enemy
tagRef.description: hurt an enemy

tagRef.name: damaged enemy cm
tagRef.description: comment to friend

tagRef.name: hurt friend
tagRef.description: hurt by a friendly AI

tagRef.name: hurt friend re
tagRef.description: response from that friend

tagRef.name: hurt friend player
tagRef.description: hurt by a friendly player

tagRef.name: hurt enemy
tagRef.description: hurt by an enemy

tagRef.name: hurt enemy re
tagRef.description: response from the enemy that hurt us ('you like that?')

tagRef.name: hurt enemy cm
tagRef.description: comment from a friend of ours

tagRef.name: hurt enemy bullet
tagRef.description: hurt by an enemy with bullets

tagRef.name: hurt enemy needler
tagRef.description: hurt by an enemy with needles

tagRef.name: hurt enemy plasma
tagRef.description: hurt by an enemy with a plasma bolt

tagRef.name: hurt enemy sniper
tagRef.description: hurt by an enemy with a sniper weapon

tagRef.name: hurt enemy grenade
tagRef.description: a grenade is stuck to us

tagRef.name: hurt enemy explosion
tagRef.description: hurt by an enemy with an explosive weapon

tagRef.name: hurt enemy melee
tagRef.description: hurt by an enemy with a melee weapon

tagRef.name: hurt enemy flame
tagRef.description: hurt by an enemy with flamethrower

tagRef.name: hurt enemy shotgun
tagRef.description: hurt by an enemy with a shotgun

tagRef.name: hurt enemy vehicle
tagRef.description: hurt by an enemy with a vehicle

tagRef.name: hurt enemy mountedweapon
tagRef.description: hurt by an enemy with a fixed weapon

tagRef.name: killed friend
tagRef.description: killed a friendly AI

tagRef.description: comment from a friend

tagRef.name: killed friend player
tagRef.description: killed a friendly player

tagRef.name: killed friend player cm
tagRef.description: comment from a friend

tagRef.description: killed an enemy

tagRef.description: comment from a friend

tagRef.description: comment from a friend

tagRef.description: comment from a friend

tagRef.description: comment from a friend

tagRef.name: killed enemy bullet

tagRef.description: killed an enemy with needles

tagRef.description: killed an enemy with a plasma bolt

tagRef.description: killed an enemy with a melee weapon

tagRef.description: killed an enemy with flamethrower

tagRef.name: killing spree
tagRef.description: we are on a killing spree

plugin.comment: responses to a friendly player killing an enemy nearby

tagRef.name: player kill cm
tagRef.description: response to the player killing an enemy

tagRef.name: player kill bullet cm
tagRef.description: response to the player killing an enemy with bullets

tagRef.name: player kill needler cm
tagRef.description: response to the player killing an enemy with needles

tagRef.name: player kill plasma cm
tagRef.description: response to the player killing an enemy with a plasma bolt

tagRef.name: player kill sniper cm
tagRef.description: response to the player killing an enemy with a sniper weapon

tagRef.name: anyone kill grenade cm
tagRef.description: response to _anyone_ killing an enemy with a grenade

tagRef.name: player kill explosion cm
tagRef.description: response to the player killing an enemy with an explosive weapon

tagRef.name: player kill melee cm
tagRef.description: response to the player killing an enemy with a melee weapon

tagRef.name: player kill flame cm
tagRef.description: response to the player killing an enemy with flamethrower

tagRef.name: player kill shotgun cm
tagRef.description: response to the player killing an enemy with a shotgun

tagRef.name: player kill vehicle cm
tagRef.description: response to the player killing an enemy by hitting them with a vehicle

tagRef.name: player kill mountedweapon cm
tagRef.description: response to the player killing an enemy with a fixed weapon

tagRef.name: player killling spree cm
tagRef.description: response to the player going on a killing spree

tagRef.name: friend died
tagRef.description: a friendly AI died

tagRef.name: friend player died
tagRef.description: a friendly player died

tagRef.name: friend killed by friend
tagRef.description: a friend died from friendly fire

tagRef.name: friend killed by friendly player
tagRef.description: friend died from player's friendly fire

tagRef.name: friend killed by enemy
tagRef.description: a friend died from enemy fire

tagRef.name: friend killed by enemy player
tagRef.description: friend died from an enemy player

tagRef.name: friend killed by covenant
tagRef.description: a friend died from covenant fire

tagRef.name: friend killed by flood
tagRef.description: a friend died from the flood

tagRef.name: friend killed by sentinel
tagRef.description: a friend died from sentinel fire

tagRef.name: friend betrayed
tagRef.description: a friend was deliberately killed by an ally that we don't trust (e.g. player killed a marine)

plugin.comment: vocalizations that can be played even if a friend is talking

tagRef.name: new combat alone
tagRef.description: see an enemy and we have not previously been in combat

tagRef.name: new enemy recent combat
tagRef.description: see a new enemy and we have recently been in combat

tagRef.name: old enemy sighted
tagRef.description: see an enemy that we are currently looking for

tagRef.name: unexpected enemy
tagRef.description: unexpectedly encounters enemy (behind or to the side)

tagRef.name: dead friend found
tagRef.description: unexpectedly finds a dead body of a friend

tagRef.name: alliance broken
tagRef.description: we decide that a former ally is now a traitor

tagRef.name: alliance reformed
tagRef.description: we forgive a traitor and make him our friend again

tagRef.name: grenade throwing
tagRef.description: throwing a grenade

tagRef.name: grenade sighted
tagRef.description: see an enemy grenade

tagRef.name: grenade startle
tagRef.description: alerted by a grenade bouncing near us

tagRef.name: grenade danger enemy
tagRef.description: in danger from an enemy grenade

tagRef.name: grenade danger self
tagRef.description: in danger from your own grenade

tagRef.name: grenade danger friend
tagRef.description: in danger from a friendly grenade (not our own)

tagRef.name: new combat group re
tagRef.description: reply to a nearby friend who alerted us to an enemy

tagRef.name: new combat nearby re
tagRef.description: reply to a distant friend who alerted us to an enemy

tagRef.name: alert friend
tagRef.description: alert a friend who is in a noncombat state

tagRef.name: alert friend re
tagRef.description: alerted by a friend when in a noncombat state

tagRef.name: alert lost contact
tagRef.description: alert friends that target was not at expected location

tagRef.name: alert lost contact re
tagRef.description: response

tagRef.name: blocked
tagRef.description: friend is blocking us from moving or firing

tagRef.name: blocked re
tagRef.description: response

tagRef.name: search start
tagRef.description: starting to search

tagRef.name: search query
tagRef.description: asking searchers whether they have found anything

tagRef.name: search query re
tagRef.description: response

tagRef.name: search report
tagRef.description: searcher reporting that an area is clear

tagRef.name: search abandon
tagRef.description: searcher giving up on search

tagRef.name: search group abandon
tagRef.description: search coordinator giving up on search

tagRef.name: group uncover
tagRef.description: starting to uncover target with friend

tagRef.name: group uncover re
tagRef.description: response

tagRef.name: advance
tagRef.description: our platoon starts to attack or advance

tagRef.name: advance re
tagRef.description: response

tagRef.name: retreat
tagRef.description: our platoon starts to defend or retreat

tagRef.name: retreat re
tagRef.description: response

tagRef.name: cover
tagRef.description: telling friends to seek cover

tagRef.name: sighted friend player
tagRef.description: sighted a new friendly player

tagRef.name: shooting
tagRef.description: shooting at an enemy

tagRef.name: shooting vehicle
tagRef.description: shooting from a vehicle at an enemy

tagRef.name: shooting berserk
tagRef.description: shooting at an enemy while berserk

tagRef.name: shooting group
tagRef.description: shooting at a group of enemies

tagRef.name: shooting traitor
tagRef.description: shooting at a traitorous player

tagRef.name: taunt
tagRef.description: taunting the enemy

tagRef.name: taunt re
tagRef.description: response

tagRef.name: flee
tagRef.description: fleeing in panic

tagRef.name: flee re
tagRef.description: response

tagRef.name: flee leader died
tagRef.description: fleeing in panic because our leaders are all dead

tagRef.name: attempted flee
tagRef.description: unable to flee because a leader is nearby

tagRef.name: attempted flee re
tagRef.description: unable to flee because a leader is nearby - response

tagRef.name: lost contact
tagRef.description: target was not at expected location

tagRef.name: hiding finished
tagRef.description: stops hiding and pursues target

tagRef.name: vehicle entry
tagRef.description: enters vehicle

tagRef.name: vehicle exit
tagRef.description: exits vehicle

tagRef.name: vehicle woohoo
tagRef.description: excited while in vehicle (big air, etc)

tagRef.name: vehicle scared
tagRef.description: scared while in vehicle (imminent crash)

tagRef.name: vehicle collision
tagRef.description: riding in a vehicle and the driver collides with something

tagRef.name: partially sighted
tagRef.description: saw something suspicious but not sure it was an enemy

tagRef.name: nothing there
tagRef.description: decided that a suspicious sighting was nothing after all

tagRef.name: pleading
tagRef.description: pleading for the player to spare our pitiable lives

tagRef.name: surprise
tagRef.description: surprised by an enemy, noise, body or weapon impact

tagRef.name: berserk
tagRef.description: went berserk

tagRef.name: melee attack
tagRef.description: attacked an enemy in melee

tagRef.name: dive
tagRef.description: dove away from danger or into cover

tagRef.name: uncover exclamation
tagRef.description: leapt out of corner to uncover a suspected target

tagRef.name: leap attack
tagRef.description: begin a leap attack

tagRef.name: resurrection
tagRef.description: arise and return to life

tagRef.name: celebration
tagRef.description: all enemies defeated

tagRef.name: check body enemy
tagRef.description: post-combat checking an enemy's dead body

tagRef.name: check body friend
tagRef.description: post-combat checking a friend's dead body

tagRef.name: shooting dead enemy
tagRef.description: post-combat shooting an enemy's dead body

tagRef.name: shooting dead enemy player
tagRef.description: post-combat shooting an enemy player's dead body

tagRef.name: alone
tagRef.description: post-combat all friends killed

tagRef.name: unscathed
tagRef.description: post-combat we were not hurt

tagRef.name: seriously wounded
tagRef.description: post-combat we were badly hurt

tagRef.name: seriously wounded re
tagRef.description: post-combat replying to a friend who was badly hurt

tagRef.name: massacre
tagRef.description: post-combat our friends took heavy casualties

tagRef.name: massacre re
tagRef.description: our friends took heavy casualties

tagRef.name: rout
tagRef.description: post-combat our friends kicked alien ass

tagRef.name: rout re
tagRef.description: our friends kicked alien ass
